titles.title: A bill to provide increased security for the voting systems of the United States, to protect against intrusion, theft, manipulation, and deletion of voter registration data and ballots, or votes cast, and to prevent cyberattacks from malicious computer hackers, and for other purposes.
SAVE Act
SAVE Act
Securing America's Voting Equipment Act of 2017
Securing America's Voting Equipment Act of 2017
SAVE Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.
